itemDescription: British politician, writer, actor and model

wikipedia_page.main: Marina Augusta Pepper (née Baker; born 8 December 1967)  is an English Liberal Democrat local politician, journalist, children's book author and former model and actress.  She was Playboy's Playmate of the Month for March 1987.

response: * Marina Baker (March 1987), journalist, children's book author, mayor of Telscombe, East Sussex, England
